info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio REST API

get.description: Retrieve a list of Commands from your account.

parameters.description: Only return Commands to or from this SIM.
parameters.name: Sim

parameters.description: Only return Commands with this status value.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Only return Commands with this direction value.
parameters.name: Direction

parameters.description: Only return Commands with this transport value.
parameters.name: Transport

post.description: Send a Command to a Sim.

parameters.description: The message body of the Command or a Base64 encoded byte string in binary mode.
parameters.name: Command

parameters.description: The Sid or UniqueName of the SIM to send the Command to.
parameters.name: Sim

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when making a request to the callback URL.
parameters.name: CallbackMethod

parameters.description: Twilio will make a request to this URL when the Command has finished sending.
parameters.name: CallbackUrl

parameters.description: A string representing which mode to send the SMS message using.
parameters.name: CommandMode

parameters.description: When sending a Command to a SIM in text mode, Twilio can automatically include the Sid of the Command in the message body, which could be used to ensure that the device does not process the same Command more than once.
parameters.name: IncludeSid

parameters.description: A boolean representing whether to request delivery receipt from the recipient.
parameters.name: DeliveryReceiptRequested

delete.description: Delete a Command instance from your account.

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Fetch a Command instance from your account.

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A user-provided string that uniquely identifies this resource as an alternative to the Sid.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A user-provided string that identifies this resource.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: Defines whether SIMs are capable of using GPRS/3G/LTE data connectivity.
parameters.name: DataEnabled

parameters.description: Network-enforced limit specifying the total Megabytes of data usage allowed during one month on the home network.
parameters.name: DataLimit

parameters.description: The model by which to meter data usage, in accordance with the two available data metering models.
parameters.name: DataMetering

parameters.description: Defines whether SIMs are capable of making and sending and receiving SMS messages via either Commands or Programmable SMS APIs.
parameters.name: MessagingEnabled

parameters.description: Defines whether SIMs are capable of making and receiving voice calls.
parameters.name: VoiceEnabled

parameters.description: Defines whether SIMs can roam onto other networks in the SIM's home country.
parameters.name: NationalRoamingEnabled

parameters.description: Network-enforced limit specifying the total Megabytes of national roaming data usage allowed during one month.
parameters.name: NationalRoamingDataLimit

parameters.description: A user-provided string that uniquely identifies this resource as an alternative to the Sid.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: A user-provided string that identifies this resource.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

get.description: Retrieve a list of Sims from your account.

parameters.description: Only return Sims with this status.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: Return Sims with this Iccid.
parameters.name: Iccid

parameters.description: Only return Sims with this Rate Plan.
parameters.name: RatePlan

parameters.description: Only return Sims with this EID.
parameters.name: EId

parameters.description: Only return Sims with this registration code.
parameters.name: SimRegistrationCode

delete.description: Delete a Sim instance from your account.

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

get.description: Fetch a Sim instance from your account.

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

post.description: Updates the given properties of a Sim instance from your account.

parameters.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this resource.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: A user-provided string that uniquely identifies this resource as an alternative to the Sid.
parameters.name: UniqueName

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when making a request to the callback URL.
parameters.name: CallbackMethod

parameters.description: Twilio will make a request to this URL when the Sim has finished updating.
parameters.name: CallbackUrl

parameters.description: A user-provided string that identifies this resource.
parameters.name: FriendlyName

parameters.description: The Sid or UniqueName of the RatePlan that this Sim should use.
parameters.name: RatePlan

parameters.description: A string representing the status of the Sim.
parameters.name: Status

parameters.description: A string representing the HTTP method to use when making a request to CommandsCallbackUrl.
parameters.name: CommandsCallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL that will receive a webhook when this Sim originates a Command.
parameters.name: CommandsCallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when requesting the sms_fallback_url.
parameters.name: SmsFallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs retrieving or executing the TwiML requested by sms_url.
parameters.name: SmsFallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when requesting the above Url.
parameters.name: SmsMethod

parameters.description: The URL Twilio will request when the SIM-connected device sends an SMS message that is not a Command.
parameters.name: SmsUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when requesting the voice_fallback_url.
parameters.name: VoiceFallbackMethod

parameters.description: The URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs retrieving or executing the TwiML requested by voice_url.
parameters.name: VoiceFallbackUrl

parameters.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when requesting the above Url.
parameters.name: VoiceMethod

parameters.description: The URL Twilio will request when the SIM-connected device makes a call.
parameters.name: VoiceUrl

parameters.description: Initiate a connectivity reset on a Sim.
parameters.name: ResetStatus

parameters.description: Only include usage that has occurred on or before this date.
parameters.name: End

parameters.description: Only include usage that has occurred on or after this date.
parameters.name: Start

parameters.description: The time-based grouping that results are aggregated by.
parameters.name: Granularity
